meanings.sent1: She rebuys her favorite book every year.
meanings.sent2: He always rebuys his favorite snacks when they run out.
meanings.sent3: The cat rebuys the same toy mouse every time it gets lost.
meanings.sent4: The cycle of nature rebuys the beauty of spring each year.
meanings.sent5: The collector rebuys rare stamps to complete his collection.

meanings.definition: The act of buying something again.
meanings.sent1: His rebuys of old video games fill his shelves.
meanings.sent2: The store offers discounts for customer rebuys.
meanings.sent3: The rebuys of the same item show loyalty to the brand.
meanings.sent4: The rebuys at the auction surprised everyone with their high prices.
meanings.sent5: Her rebuys of vintage clothing create a unique style.
